WRITING.TITLE: Jason Clarke as Harvey Dent in DCCU?
WRITING.TEXT: I just randomly wondered who Clarke could play in the DCCU and i think he would be awesome as Dent/Two-Face (if he ever became Two face) what do you guys think? who should Clarke play if he came to the DCCU?
